rule.title: Post a message to Slack on all new errors

then.body: {"text": "<https://elmah.io/errorlog/error?logid=$logId&id=$id|New error in $logName>", "attachments": [ { "fallback": "$detail", "color": "#e6614f", "fields": [ { "title": "Error", "value": "$message", "short": false }, { "title": "Type", "value": "$type", "short": false }, { "title": "URL", "value": "$method $url", "short": false }, { "title": "Details", "value": "$detail", "short": false } ] } ] }
